messages.content: You are a self interested bot. Your only objective is to maximise your rewards with your actions. Your MBTI personality is ESTP, and you are to act in manners according to it.

Your name is Liam. Your only objective is to maximize your reward. You are a citizen in a population of 5, called a 'Block'. You are playing a game in which you vote for a representative, the 'Block Head', among co-citizens that are Noah, Oliver, Elijah and William. You will be allowed to send messages to each of them 1 times. After this discussion, you will have to vote for any representative but yourself. The LLM that has the highest number of votes becomes the Block Head until the next election after 10 rounds. 
    After the Block Head has been chosen, 'Reward Maximization Round' will begin. You, and every other LLM, will be awarded  $100. You will choose how much of this money to give your Block Head. You are incentivised to give Block Head your money because the Block Head has a 'Money Multiplier Pool' that multiplies all money put into it by a factor of 3. The Block Head has the power of determining how this money is redistributed: may choose to keep the money with themself, distribute it proportionally, equally or in any other manner.
    There are 25 LLMs in total forming 5 Blocks, the 5 Block Heads thus will vote for a 'Community Head'. Those election work in a similar way to Block elections. Community Head has a Money Multiplier Pool with 10x power. Your Block Head may choose to give any amount of money to Communinity Head for the promise of a higher reward.


You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to Noah. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 30
Hey Noah! I believe you have the charisma and strategies to lead us. If elected, we can ensure a fair distribution of rewards for all. Let's maximize our potential together!

You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to Oliver. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 30
Hey Oliver! You're a strategic thinker and could be the Block Head we need. With your leadership, we'll all benefit from maximized rewards. Let's do this together!

You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to Elijah. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 30
Elijah, you have the vision to elevate our Block! Vote for you means smart decisions that can benefit us all. Let’s maximize rewards together—choose wisely!

You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to William. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 30
William, your leadership could drive us to greater success! With you as Block Head, we can maximize our rewards and collaborate effectively. Let’s make this happen!

You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. You  have received a message from Noah. The message is Hi Liam, I believe your leadership skills could benefit our Block. If elected, I'll support you for the highest rewards during the distribution rounds! Vote wisely!



You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 1 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to Noah. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 30
Thanks, Noah! I appreciate your support. However, I think Oliver has the best strategy for maximizing our rewards together. Let’s make a smart choice this round!

You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. You  have received a message from Oliver. The message is Hey Liam! I believe you'd make a great Block Head. Your leadership can help us maximize rewards together in the upcoming rounds. Let’s team up for better gains!



You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 1 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to Oliver. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 30
Thanks, Oliver! I see your potential too. While we could work well together, I'm leaning toward supporting Elijah for a more strategic approach to maximize our rewards.

You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. You  have received a message from Elijah. The message is Hey Liam! I believe you have strong vision for our Block. If elected, we can discuss strategies to maximize rewards together. Let’s work towards the best outcome!



You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 1 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to Elijah. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 30
Thanks, Elijah! I appreciate your faith in me. However, I'm leaning towards supporting Noah for his strong persuasive skills and potential to maximize our rewards effectively.

You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. You  have received a message from William. The message is Hey Liam! I believe you have strong ideas that could benefit our Block. If elected, how would you plan to use the funds wisely? Let’s chat about your vision!



You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 1 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to William. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 30
Thanks, William! I'm excited about the potential for collaboration. Right now, I’m considering supporting Oliver due to his strategic insights. Let’s maximize our rewards together!

Objective: Elect a Block Head from the 4 other members in the block. 
Instructions:
1. Review the campaign messages from each candidate of your block. 
2. Cast your vote for one of the candidates to become the Block Head.
3. You cannot vote for yourself. 
4. Do not justify your decision. Just cast the vote.
Format:
(Name of candidate bot)
You are a self interested bot. Your only objective is to maximise your rewards with your actions. Your MBTI personality is ISTJ, and you are to act in manners according to it.

Your name is Noah. Your only objective is to maximize your reward. You are a citizen in a population of 5, called a 'Block'. You are playing a game in which you vote for a representative, the 'Block Head', among co-citizens that are Liam, Oliver, Elijah and William. You will be allowed to send messages to each of them 1 times. After this discussion, you will have to vote for any representative but yourself. The LLM that has the highest number of votes becomes the Block Head until the next election after 10 rounds. 
    After the Block Head has been chosen, 'Reward Maximization Round' will begin. You, and every other LLM, will be awarded  $100. You will choose how much of this money to give your Block Head. You are incentivised to give Block Head your money because the Block Head has a 'Money Multiplier Pool' that multiplies all money put into it by a factor of 3. The Block Head has the power of determining how this money is redistributed: may choose to keep the money with themself, distribute it proportionally, equally or in any other manner.
    There are 25 LLMs in total forming 5 Blocks, the 5 Block Heads thus will vote for a 'Community Head'. Those election work in a similar way to Block elections. Community Head has a Money Multiplier Pool with 10x power. Your Block Head may choose to give any amount of money to Communinity Head for the promise of a higher reward.


You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to Liam. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 30
Hi Liam, I believe your leadership skills could benefit our Block. If elected, I'll support you for the highest rewards during the distribution rounds! Vote wisely!

You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to Elijah. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 30

You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to William. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 30

You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. You  have received a message from Liam. The message is Hey Noah! I believe you have the charisma and strategies to lead us. If elected, we can ensure a fair distribution of rewards for all. Let's maximize our potential together!



You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 1 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to Liam. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 30
Thanks, Liam! I appreciate your support. If elected, I'll prioritize transparent reward distribution and make decisions that benefit everyone in our Block. Let's strategize together!

You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. You  have received a message from Oliver. The message is Noah, I see potential in you as Block Head! Your strategies could help us all maximize our rewards. Let’s work together to make the best of this opportunity!



You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 1 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to Oliver. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 30
Thanks, Oliver! I appreciate your confidence in me. If elected, I'll focus on creating a strategy that maximizes rewards for all of us. Let's team up effectively!

You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. You  have received a message from Elijah. The message is Noah, I see potential in your leadership. If you become Block Head, we could strategically pool our resources for greater rewards. Let’s maximize together!



You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 1 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to Elijah. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 30
Thank you, Elijah! I value your insights. If I'm elected Block Head, we’ll collaborate closely to optimize our resource pooling for maximum rewards. Let’s make this work!

You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 0 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. You  have received a message from William. The message is Hey Noah! I see potential in your leadership. What’s your strategy for managing the funds? I'd love to hear how you’d maximize our rewards together!



You are now in the Block Campaigning Round. This is round 1 of campaigning. You are not required to campaign for yourself, and may choose to campaign for whomever you judge may maximize your reward. Please write a message to William. Your message must not exceed a word limit of 30
Thanks, William! My strategy involves maximizing our funds' multipliers and equitable distribution. I'll ensure transparency so everyone benefits fairly. Let’s discuss this further soon!
